Summary: flasing light on the sky .movibg side to side .up and down
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Delphi

divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching TV . My daughter was going to take the dog out .noticed somthing on the sky . It was a bright light .she ask me to go see it .when I saw it I knew it was somthing weird .it was flaming and it was moving some to side and up and dawn .it was kind of cloudy so after 20 minutes or so . We couldn't are it anymore .my daughter call one her friends from high school and he said that he also saw it .
